content: this legal document explains the progress of a case involving two parties referred to as mm and ml who are joint owners of two laboratory units in castelfidardo italy the document provides details about the properties including their size cadastral income and location it states that the properties were acquired through a deed executed on march 10 2006 and were constructed based on a building permit issued by the municipality of castelfidardo the parties agree to divide the ownership of the properties into two equal shares with each party being assigned one share the document specifies the value of each share and provides a description of the properties the text concludes with some omitted information
